name: シャダム・クルセイダー 遥かなる王国
summary:
Defenders of Oasis, known as Shadam Crusader: Harukanaru Oukoku (シャダム・クルセイダー ～遙かなる王国～) in Japan, is a Sega Game Gear RPG.
The game takes place in a setting influenced by the Arabian Nights and ancient Middle-Eastern culture, like Beyond Oasis and Prince of Persia.
It was released in Japan in September 1992, and in North America in Winter 1992.
